list.title: Left - Title and Index
list.introduction: Left section still remained same as project page with the title, subtitle and index list of all the sections' name. When click on the index, the right page scrolling down to the certain section.

list.title: Right - Section List
list.introduction: On the right are the title of this section and a list of details, including design, implementation details and reference and any useful links. Documentation and reference links are linked on the images.
